sitemapList.title: Sitemaps
sitemapList.subtitle: Manage sitemaps to include them into index sitemap.xml

formSitemap.descriptionSitemapLocation: Sitemap location should be a relative sitemap URL unique in context of index sitemap, i.e.: 'categories/electronics.xml', 'products.xml', etc. Please avoid using 'sitemap.xml' in sitemap path.
formSitemap.sitemapIndexErrorMessage: Please avoid using "sitemap.xml" as sitemap location
formSitemap.sitemapSitemapLocationExistErrorMessage: This sitemap location is already used
formSitemap.descriptionSitemapItemsLocation: To generate a sitemap item URL can be used the next patterns: {slug} - will be replaced with SEO semantic URL part constructed depend on store SEO 'Links settings' rules. E.g /my-page/{slug}

sitemap.noSitemapsIemsMessage: There are no sitemap items yet

formCustomSitemapItem.descriptionUrlTemplate: The concrete relative URL  for custom items, i.e.: /about-us, /my-folder/my-page

sitemap-delete.title: Delete confirmation
sitemap-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete selected sitemaps?

sitemapItems-delete.title: Remove confirmation
sitemapItems-delete.message: Are you sure you want to remove selected items from sitemap?

confirmBaseUrl.title: Base URL
confirmBaseUrl.messageNoBaseUrl: Please enter base URL for sitemaps
confirmBaseUrl.messageConfirmBaseUrl: Please confirm base URL for sitemaps

discardChanges.title: Save changes
discardChanges.message: The sitemap has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

errorMessages.filenameNotUnique: Sitemap with this filename already exists
